Event.Message: The Windows Memory Diagnostics Tool scheduled the testing of the computer's memory to run immediately
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="LaunchType" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ScheduleType" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The Windows Memory Diagnostics Tool scheduled the testing of the computer's memory to run the next time the computer starts
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="LaunchType" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ScheduleType" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The Windows Memory Diagnostics Tool could not schedule the testing of the computer's memory
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="LaunchType" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ScheduleType" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>
